p: A standardized, pre-piloted form was used for data extraction including: study design; data sources; definition of the target disease; perspective and setting of the analysis; target patient groups and sample sizes. Cost data were extracted for the following items: ED and hospitalizations events; outpatient visits (with a distinction, if any, between GPs and specialists); prescription drugs and OTC drugs. Evidence on inappropriate influenza-related use of direct healthcare resources was also searched in the selected studies.
